comments.comment: Obata sttiti palamuwa..desa palakayan diwa deken kata karana ayai..wasiyata kat adina palakayo..khomat api mudal maubimata yawanne naha me etta natta hariyatama heli unata passe..tamai yawanna balapprottu wenne mokada desa palana gunddu mewa...sakai meyala ehama panatak genawe naha kiyala dan boruwata kiyawanawa...kawada me rawatanne..rate janatawa noweda ada kale 60 ,70  dasakaye janatawa neme enne  .janatawata ratawanna amarui dan ....apiwa dunuwat kalata tuti
